data.name: Access Savings Account
data.description: Our basic transaction account with all the features and an overdraft, if you need it.

features.additionalInfo: This account can be used as the target of an NPP PayID.
Automatic payments can be scheduled to pay your bills and/or split your pay into designated savings accounts.
An initial card on each account, replacements for defective cards and automatic card renewals are free. A fee applies for each additional card ordered at your request.
Track payments with SMS and email alerts.
Combined balances of up to $250,000 per account holder are guaranteed and secured by the Australian Government.
6 Free Over the Counter (Branch) transactions per month.
Bank 24/7 wherever you are and whenever you want with RAB mobile and internet banking.

You can apply to have an overdraft linked to the Access Savings account. All applications for credit are subject to responsible lending criteria and fees and charges apply. For full details visit our website.
Visa Debit Card available to Australian Residents and members aged > 14 years
Make deposits and withdrawals through a Bank@Post facility at Australia Post outlets. For full details refer to our Conditions of Use. Fees and charges apply.
Business members only ~ A cheque book is available on request. For full details refer to our Conditions of Use. Fees and charges apply.
This account can be used to send an NPP payment.

features.additionalValue: ATM, Internet, Mobile & Phone Banking transactions.
features.additionalInfo: ATM, Internet, Mobile & Phone Banking transactions. No withdrawal fees at Regional Australia Bank ATMs. Transactions at other financial institutions’ ATMs may incur a fee.

constraints.additionalInfo: A minimum balance of $1 is required to earn interest on this product.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Individuals must be citizens or permanent residents of Australia.
As a customer-owned bank, customers must also become a shareholder of Regional Australia Bank to be eligible to open an account.

fees.name: Transaction Listing Print Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies where you ask us to print a listing of your transactions. A minimum fee of $2.50 applies plus $0.50 per additional 2 pages or part thereof to a maximum of $10.00.

fees.name: Cheque Copy or Trace Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies where you request a copy of: a personal cheque you have written or deposited; a Regional Australia Bank cheque; or an ANZ deposit slip. Also applies where you wish to determine if a cheque you have written has been deposited or reached its intended destination.

fees.name: Cheque Deposit Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Your first 10 cheque deposits to your membership each month are free, each subsequent deposit will be charged per cheque.

fees.name: Over the Counter Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies per counter withdrawal or debit transfer once the monthly limit of 6 included withdrawals is exceeded.

discounts.additionalInfo: Members with a monthly membership balance greater than $5,000 are exempt from paying the OTC Fee.

eligibility.additionalInfo: The monthly membership balance is calculated by adding together the minimum savings, investment and lending balances held in the membership during the course of the month. The Your Choice Visa and Lite Credit Card balances are not taken into account in assessing the monthly membership balance.

fees.name: Foreign Currency Cheque Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when a foreign currency cheque or draft that has been deposited into an account has been dishonoured.

fees.name: Direct Debit Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies where a direct debit request is rejected by us due to insufficient funds in your account.

fees.name: Personal Cheque Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies to each personal cheque drawn from your account where there are insufficient funds in the account to cover the value of the cheque.

fees.name: Bank@Post Transaction Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when you perform a deposit or withdrawal on your account through a Bank@Post outlet. This fee also applies if your transaction is declined.

fees.name: Access Fee
fees.additionalInfo: The Access Fee is a flat monthly fee which entitles your membership to unlimited withdrawals via EFTPOS, ATMs, Internet, Phone and Mobile Banking.

discounts.additionalInfo: Any Member who meets the eligibility criteria below will not be charged this fee.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Customers who are under 18 years of age will not be charged the Access Fee.

Members who hold a monthly membership balance in excess of $5000 will not be charged this fee. The monthly membership balance is calculated by adding together the minimum savings, investment and lending balances held in the membership during the course of the month. The Your Choice Visa and Lite Credit Card balances are not taken into account in assessing the monthly membership balance.
Customers who do not withdraw within the month will  not be charged the Access Fee.

fees.name: Dormant Account Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies if there is no member generated transaction activity on your account for a period of seven (7) years.

fees.name: Outward Telegraphic Transfer AUD Fee (to Foreign account)
fees.additionalInfo: Applies to Real Time Gross Settlement (RTGS)/ Telegraphic Transfers to an account in a foreign country in Australian dollars.

fees.name: Over Limit Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies for each day that a Direct Debit or Cheque transaction is debited to a member which results in a deposit or overdraft account being drawn beyond its available balance or limit.

fees.name: Currency Conversion Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies as a percentage of the transaction value to withdrawals and purchases made outside of Australia using your Regional Australia Bank Visa Debit or Access Card.

fees.name: Cash Handling Fee - Members
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when you order bulk cash/coin from us. Minimum Fee Amount - $10.00

discounts.additionalInfo: Members with a monthly membership balance greater than $5,000 are exempt.

eligibility.additionalInfo: The monthly membership balance is calculated by adding together the minimum savings, investment and lending balances held in the membership during the course of the month. The Your Choice Visa and Lite Credit Card balances are not taken into account in assessing the monthly membership balance.

discounts.description: Customers Aged under 18 years of age
discounts.additionalInfo: Customers who are under 18 years of age will not be charged this Fee.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Customers who are under 18 years of age will not be charged this Fee.

fees.name: Electronic Transfer Recall Fees
fees.additionalInfo: Applies where you erroneously request a funds transfer to an external account and subsequently ask us to attempt to recall the transaction

fees.name: Outward Telegraphic Transfer AUD Fee (to Australian account)
fees.additionalInfo: Applies to Real Time Gross Settlement (RTGS)/ Telegraphic Transfers to an account within Australia.

fees.name: Audit Certificate Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Per hour. Minimum $30 per Certificate. Applies to each Audit Certificate or Bank Confirmation request submitted by you or an authorised agent (such as an accountant, solicitor or auditor) acting on your behalf.

fees.name: Secure Token Replacement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Secure Tokens are used to authorise large transactions initiated by Internet and Mobile Banking. The initial token is free, but this fee is levied to replace each broken or lost token.

fees.name: Overseas Draft Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when you order a draft from us.

fees.name: Financial Institution Cheque Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies for each bank cheque you order from us.

fees.name: Stop Payment on Cheque Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies where you request us to cancel a personal or Regional Australia Bank cheque drawn on your account.

fees.name: Foreign Cheque Deposit Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies to each foreign cheque, whether in Australian dollars or another currency, deposited into your account.

fees.name: Online International Payment
fees.additionalInfo: Applies to each International Payment you perform through Internet Banking.

fees.name: Replacement Card Fee
fees.additionalInfo: The initial card on each account, replacements for defective cards and automatic card renewals are free, however a fee applies for each replacement card ordered at your request.

fees.name: Inward Telegraphic Transfer AUD Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies to incoming Real Time Gross Settlement (RTGS)/ Telegraphic Transfers received to your account.

fees.name: Cheque Deposit Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies to each cheque deposited to your account that is dishonoured by the drawer’s bank.

fees.name: Emergency Visa Card Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies if you request us to issue you with an emergency replacement card whilst overseas.

fees.name: Cheque Book Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged per cheque when you order a cheque book for your account.

fees.name: Foreign Cash Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when you purchase foreign cash from us or wish to deposit foreign cash into your account. Minimum fee of $10.00 applies.

fees.name: Interest on Over Limit Balances
fees.additionalInfo: If your account becomes overdrawn default interest will apply on the amount that exceeds the available balance at an interest rate 3% above the Standard Overdraft rate. If your overdraft exceeds its credit limit an interest rate 3% above the existing overdraft rate will apply to the over limit amount for each day the account is over the limit.

fees.name: Outward Telegraphic Transfer Foreign Currency Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies to Real Time Gross Settlement (RTGS)/ Telegraphic Transfers to an account in a foreign country in the destination currency.

fees.name: Overseas Draft Cancellation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when you ask us to cancel an overseas draft.

fees.name: Declined Visa Dispute Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies where you opt to dispute or request further information from the merchant about a Visa transaction. The fee will only apply to each dispute where evidence suggests you participated in or authorised the transaction, or failed to sufficiently protect your card details.

fees.name: Document Search Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged per hour, or part thereof, when you request us to retrieve historical documents related to your account.

fees.name: Company Search Fee
fees.additionalInfo: At-cost. When you apply for a membership in the name of an incorporated organisation or request a change to signatories on the account we are obligated to perform a Company Search through ASIC. This fee is applied to the company’s account on behalf of ASIC.

fees.name: Duplicate Copy of Statement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies if you request a duplicate copy of a formal account statement.

fees.name: Inactive Account Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies annually if there are no transactions on your membership in the preceding 12 months.

fees.name: Unsecured Overdraft Approval Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies upon approval of an unsecured Overdraft facility.

fees.name: Electronic Transfer Trace Fees
fees.additionalInfo: Applies where you erroneously request a funds transfer to an external account and subsequently request us to check the transaction.

depositRates.additionalInfo: Interest is calculated on the minimum monthly balance and paid to the account every 6 months.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Interest is charged at this rate on all debit balances within an approved overdraft limit. Debit balances over an approved limit will incur interest at the default interest rate.
